gameDetails.name: Zombicide Survivor: Bill
gameDetails.description:
This promotional Survivor is available as a prize for the map/scenario design contest sponsored by Guillotine Games, which can be found on their website. There may be other ways to acquire this Survivor in the future. A zombie version (Zombivor) is also available.

Available in the promo-pack Zombicide Gaming Night #3: Zombie Trap
